social studies to increase the amount of industry in a place or region industrialization noun [ U ] us/ɪnˌdʌs·tri·ə·ləˈzeɪ·ʃən/
Add to word list
Add to word list
to develop industry within a country: The government's trickiest challenge is how to industrialise, and move people out of the lagging agricultural sector.
